s: FROM HUMBLE ROOTS: Carolina Grits Company is nestled on the banks of the Tar River in Nash County, North Carolina. Family owned and operated, the mill produces small batch grits and cornmeal varieties of the highest quality. Small Business This product is from a small business brand.

Carolina Grits Company produces stone ground grits and cornmeal. We are a small family owned and operated mill in Eastern North Carolina. We continue to expand our lines of conventional, organic and heirloom varietals of grits and cornmeal. Gluten Free, non-GMO and whole grain goodness.
